name: Minecraft Cave In
description:
A very simple top down fast paced space invader type shooter. Minecraft Cave In is a fan made game by myself and my son (who was  eight at the time) as a fun little project to get him in to code and building games. 

Shoot the blocks and don't die for as long as you can to get the high score.

If there is any interest in this I have some ideas to add to it. Like more weapons  upgrades, shields and Mobs

I will also be releasing the source for this just as soon as I have it cleaned up a bit.

User WAS & D or Arrow keys to move
